remarks:
Extend wff definition to include "Reflexive" applied to a class, which is true iff class R is a reflexive relationship over the set A. See ~ df-reflexive .  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 1-Dec-2019.) 

---

This syntax is primitive. The first axiom using it is #P_df-reflexive|NAV_LINK|HIDE_TVI.
